insert into t_ssm_sal_order_items
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_DATE,
ITEM_NO,
MATNR,
REF_MATNR,
UNIT,
QTY,
TYPE,
PROM_NO,
#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{itemNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{refMatnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{promNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT i.*, ex.WERKS WERKS, ex.RESLO RESLO, i.QTY SUM_QTY, IFNULL(( SELECT DISTINCT unit FROM t_ssm_gi_order_item it INNER JOIN t_ssm_gi_order d ON it.ORDER_NO = d.ORDER_NO WHERE d.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO AND it.MATNR = i.MATNR ),m.BASE_UNIT) BASE_UNIT FROM t_ssm_sal_order_items i JOIN t_ssm_sal_order o ON i.ORDER_DATE = o.ORDER_DATE AND i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND i.QTY > 0 AND i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO JOIN t_md_branch b ON b.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO JOIN t_md_mara m ON m.MATNR = i.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = b.SALES_ORG JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex ON m.MATNR = ex.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG

SELECT i.*, ex.WERKS WERKS, ex.RESLO RESLO, i.QTY SUM_QTY, m.BASE_UNIT FROM t_ssm_sal_order_items i JOIN t_ssm_sal_order o ON i.ORDER_DATE = o.ORDER_DATE AND i.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND i.QTY > 0 AND i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO JOIN t_md_branch b ON b.BRANCH_NO = o.BRANCH_NO JOIN t_md_mara m ON m.MATNR = i.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = b.SALES_ORG JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex ON m.MATNR = ex.MATNR AND m.SALES_ORG = ex.SALES_ORG

SELECT i.MATNR,ex.SHORT_TXT MATNR_TXT,i.QTY,i.TYPE,i.UNIT FROM t_ssm_sal_order_items i LEFT JOIN t_md_mara_ex ex ON i.MATNR = ex.MATNR and ex.SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg} where 1=1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} ORDER BY i.MATNR ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_ssm_sal_order_items where 1=1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT matnr, sum(DISCOUNT_AMT) FROM ( SELECT i.ORDER_NO, i.MATNR matnr, r.PRICE1 * (1 - o.DISCOUNT_AMT) * i.QTY AS DISCOUNT_AMT FROM t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item i JOIN t_preorder o ON i.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO AND o.BRANCH_NO = ${branchNo} JOIN t_promotion p ON o.PROMOTION = p.PROM_NO AND p.PROM_SUB_TYPE = 'Z017' JOIN t_md_mara_ex e ON i.MATNR = e.MATNR AND e.SALES_ORG = ${salesOrg} AND ( ( e.PRE_DAYS = 2 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{secondDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) OR ( e.PRE_DAYS = 1 AND i.DISP_DATE = #{firstDay,jdbcType=DATE} ) ) LEFT JOIN t_mara_price_rel r ON i.MATNR = r.MATNR AND r.SALES_ORG = ${salesOrg} JOIN t_md_price pr ON pr.ID = r.ID AND pr.PRICE_TYPE = '10' ) a GROUP BY matnr;
